extendedInfo.description: Retro Photo Effects is a fun and easy to use app that will let you convert photos from your phone, camera or Facebook and convert them into old, vintage photos. Our effects are fast and easy to use. Instructions:1. Choose a photo from your phone, Facebook or take one with your camera2. Crop it with our cropping tool3. Choose the effect you'd like to apply. We current have 3 effects, each with sliders to completely change the look. 4. Use our sliders to make your image look perfect5. Save the image to your phone or share it on Facebook with 2 simple clicks!Our Retro Photo Effects application supports Black & White as well as color effects. Take a look at our screenshots to see some of the possibilities. Our Effects:Gray ScaleSimple OldVintage Old (Our most famous retro effect)Each effect also comes with sliders that you can use to completely change the effects. You can take color out, make it look older or newer. There are hundreds of variations for you to try!

reviews.comment: There were only 4 different ones time choose from and they were black and white tones, old look, not worth having very disappointed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Cool and amazing effect, really worth to try.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dodgy
reviews.comment: Dodgy looking. So many ads and you can only crop it and you habe a choice from 4 effects, all black and white. Also it\'s slow.
reviews.author: Abi Rickman

reviews.title: Hands off Adware
reviews.comment: If you don\'t like push notifications don\'t install. Lookout sees it as adware.
reviews.author: Deeva Satanica

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: 3rd effect. (Old) is amazing. Never seen that quality on android apps.
reviews.author: A Google User
